raw.title: [BIP-280] Pay DAO Multisig Stipends for H1 ‘23
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### [PR with Payload](https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/170)

### Motivation

Per [this proposal](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/proposal-transition-treasury-control-to-governance-multisig/2357), the expectation was set that DAO Multisig signers would be paid 500 BAL every six months. If approved, this BIP would see 5,000 BAL paid out to the 11 DAO Multisig signers for their work over the previous six months.

Ernesto (BGD) has opted out from taking his stipend, that's why the amount is 5,000 BAL rather than 5,500 BAL.

### Specification

The DAO Multisig `0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f` will send 500 BAL to each of the following addresses:

Mounir (Paraswap): 0x0951FF0835302929d6c0162b3d2495A85e38ec3A
0xMaki: 0x285b7EEa81a5B66B62e7276a24c1e0F83F7409c1
AlexLange: 0x3ABDc84Dd15b0058B281D7e26CCc3932cfb268aA
trentmc0: 0x478eC43c6867c2884f87B21c164f1fD1308bD9a3
solarcurve: 0x512fce9B07Ce64590849115EE6B32fd40eC0f5F3
Evan (Copper): 0x59693BA1A5764e087CE166ac0E0085Fc071B9ea7
nanexcool: 0x823DF0278e4998cD0D06FB857fBD51e85b18A250
bonustrack87: 0x9BE6ff2A1D5139Eda96339E2644dC1F05d803600
Stefan (Gnosis): 0x9F7dfAb2222A473284205cdDF08a677726d786A0
David Gerai: 0xAc1aA53108712d7f38093A67d380aD54B562a650

choices: No, this is not the way

cleaned.title: [BIP-526] Pay BAL to DAO Multisig signers, H2-2023
cleaned.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e

raw.title: [BIP-526] Pay BAL to DAO Multisig signers, H2-2023
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
## PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/719

### Motivation

Per [this proposal ](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/proposal-transition-treasury-control-to-governance-multisig/2357), the expectation was set that DAO Multisig signers would be paid 500 BAL every six months. If approved, this BIP would see 5,500 BAL paid out to the 11 DAO Multisig signers for their work over the previous six months.

Based on feedback from signers and the team around tax implications, instead of sending BAL to all signers, we asked who wanted it and only included those who responded.  Any of the other signers are free to request BAL payments, which will be paid referencing this BIP


### Specification

The DAO Multisig `0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f` will send 500 BAL to each of the following addresses:

Mounir (Paraswap): 0x0951FF0835302929d6c0162b3d2495A85e38ec3A
0xMaki: 0x285b7EEa81a5B66B62e7276a24c1e0F83F7409c1
Evan (Copper): 0x59693BA1A5764e087CE166ac0E0085Fc071B9ea7
Tritium (Balancer Maxis): 0xcf4fF1e03830D692F52EB094c52A5A6A2181Ab3F
nanexcool: 0x823DF0278e4998cD0D06FB857fBD51e85b18A250
Stefan (Gnosis): 0x9F7dfAb2222A473284205cdDF08a677726d786A0


Further, the DAO Multisig is authorized to send 500 BAL each to the following addresses until the end of February if payments is requested.  After this date H2-2023 DAO multisig payments will be considered complete without further payment for  the period authorized under this BIP. 


AlexLange: 0x3ABDc84Dd15b0058B281D7e26CCc3932cfb268aA
trentmc0: 0x478eC43c6867c2884f87B21c164f1fD1308bD9a3
bonustrack87: 0x9BE6ff2A1D5139Eda96339E2644dC1F05d803600
David Gerai: 0xAc1aA53108712d7f38093A67d380aD54B562a650

choices: No, this is not the way

cleaned.title: [BIP-681] Update DAO Multisig Signers and Backup Signers
cleaned.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17

raw.title: [BIP-681] Update DAO Multisig Signers and Backup Signers
raw.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17
raw.body:
## Payload PR
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1223
## TL;DR

* Replace Trent with Gosuto on the DAO multisig
* Establish a new, updated, canonical list of Backup Signers for the DAO Multisig.
* Pay out signers their 500 BAL each for H1-2024

## Background:

The Balancer DAO multisig is responsible for enacting most governance outside of incentives management. The safes managed by this signer set hold the keys to the protocols on-chain configuration and the treasury. The DAO multisig is a 6/11 gnosis safe on each chain we operate on. Governance operates on a weekly cadence. [The DAO multisig signers](https://docs.balancer.fi/concepts/governance/multisig.html#dao-multisig-signer-set) may be asked to sign once per week, although work is done to try to batch payloads and call on them less often.

As with many DeFi Protocol Multisigs, the DAO multisig signer set is made up of DeFi OGs and protocol founders who have a long, established and strong reputation as leaders in web3. They are joined by myself, who handles operations and works with the Balancer Maxis to assemble and review payloads and reports for the DAO Multisig to review and sign.

After a long tenure on the Balancer DAO Multisig the honorable ser Trent McConaghy has decided not to continue to be on call each week. We deeply thank Trent for his service. We can not be grateful enough.

## Purpose of this Governance:
As signers have left in the past, there has been no BIP due to the DAO Multisig Replacement list, last updated June 2022 by [BIP-16](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-16-update-dao-multisig-replacement-list/3361/2). Since this list is both outdated and fragmented between governance texts, this BIP seeks to:

1. Establish a new list of backup signers
2. Appoint Gosuto, a second operational signer from the Maxis to replace Trent and back me up/share some of the operational workload.
3. Pay the Mulitsigners, 500 BAL each for their service in H1-2024 according to this circa 2021 [Governance Proposal](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/proposal-transition-treasury-control-to-governance-multisig/2357)

## Updated signers and backup signers

Gosuto (`0x11761c7b08287d9489CD84C04DF6852F5C07107b`) will be added to replace Trent.

The Backup signer list will be replaced to contain the following backup signers:

|Name|Affiliation|Signer Address|
| --- | --- | --- |
|Lewis|Stablecoin Labs/Gyro|0xbcf751dBfe314Ee96A660EFA2Fcb259CBc364c29|
|Anna|Cowswap|0x04ce1ccF81AE660e23ca0c0823911df709B0E7Fc|
|Hubert|StakeDAO|0x02e4De712d99f4B1b1e12aa3675D8b0A582caA5D|
|Figue|Paladin|0x009d13e9bec94bf16791098ce4e5c168d27a9f07|
|Elbagococina|Karpatkey|0x6578183A203b41C419b93DF9121b5e3b26561aC5|

The Backup signers may be swapped out with standing signers at any time, with notice posted to the forum but no token-holder voting.

## DAO signers foregoing BAL payments

Some signers have asked not to receive funds and/or have not confirmed that they clearly wish to receive them. These signers will not be paid, but instead granted a right to request payment until the end of September 2024 as defined by specification #4 below.

## Specifications

If this BIP passes:

1: The backup signer list above would become the new, canonical signer list replacing all past signer lists.

2: The DAO multisig on each chain would execute a transaction to replace Trent(`0x478eC43c6867c2884f87B21c164f1fD1308bD9a3`) with Gosuto(`0x11761c7b08287d9489CD84C04DF6852F5C07107b`)

3: The DAO Multisig would send 500 BAL each on mainnet to the following addresses:

Mounir (Paraswap): 0x0951FF0835302929d6c0162b3d2495A85e38ec3A

0xMaki: 0x285b7EEa81a5B66B62e7276a24c1e0F83F7409c1

Evan (Copper): 0x59693BA1A5764e087CE166ac0E0085Fc071B9ea7

Tritium (Balancer Maxis): 0xcf4fF1e03830D692F52EB094c52A5A6A2181Ab3F

nanexcool(separate payment address): 0x72BA1965320ab5352FD6D68235Cc3C5306a6FFA2

Stefan (Gnosis): 0x9F7dfAb2222A473284205cdDF08a677726d786A0

4: The DAO multisig would be permitted to pay 500 BAL each to the following addresses should they request payment by the end of September 2024:

AlexLange: 0x3ABDc84Dd15b0058B281D7e26CCc3932cfb268aA

trentmc0: 0x478eC43c6867c2884f87B21c164f1fD1308bD9a3

bonustrack87: 0x9BE6ff2A1D5139Eda96339E2644dC1F05d803600

David Gerai: 0xAc1aA53108712d7f38093A67d380aD54B562a650

Ernesto: 0xA39a62304d8d43B35114ad7bd1258B0E50e139b3

Please note this is set to be executed a week later than the snapshot round ends; not immediately after concluding.

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: The proposal to update the DAO multisig signer set, pay stipends, and add a proposer role is unanimously supported by voters with strong timeline stability and early participation. Forum sentiment is neutral but constructive, reflecting acceptance of the changes. Similar past proposals passed successfully with positive TVL impact.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous early and stable voting support for 'Yes, let's do it'.
Operational necessity to update multisig signers and finalize stipends for 2024.
Addition of proposer role adds redundancy and improves transaction proposal process.
Similar past proposals passed with positive TVL impact, indicating organizational benefit.
key_arguments_against: No significant opposition or negative sentiment found in forum discussion.
Minor negative price impact noted in similar proposals but outweighed by TVL growth.

evidence.quote: Forum comments are neutral with no opposition or significant concerns raised.
Timeline metrics show unanimous lead for 'Yes, let's do it' with stability and early vote dominance.
All passed with 'Yes, let's do it', had positive TVL impact and minimal price declines.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.simulation_reason: Recommendation based on timeline metrics, forum sentiment, and historical analogous proposals to maximize organizational operational efficiency and stability.
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- The proposal has unanimous and stable early voting support indicating strong consensus.
- Forum sentiment is neutral and does not oppose the changes, aligning with the vote outcome.
- Similar past proposals aimed at operational improvements passed with positive TVL impacts, supporting the benefit of this proposal.
- Market price impact is negative but should not override the clear operational necessity and community consensus.
- Recommendation aligns with aggregated forum sentiment and voting trends to ensure durable organizational benefit.
